__e: You have the nicest eyes when you haven't got your glasses on.
No, but I'm told she has fine eyes!
Has anybody ever told you you have really beautiful eyes?
May the rainbow bridge the two ends of ocean ...and bridge you and me.
And... and all you have are... are... are your beautiful memories and pictures of your life together.
You know, I don't really have the best memories of it, but...
I have beautiful hair, I travel the world, and I live in a house that I pay nothing for.
"listen, girl, I know he has cute floppy hair and all..."
And we cannot argue that she is a very good-looking girl with great hair.
What if I told you that he had married a black woman and had three beautiful children with her?
If it wasn't for him I wouldn't have my two beautiful children and I would not know how to be a mother both to them and to the American people.
I told her we'd buy a house, make beautiful babies together.
I've had a great time, and it's thanks to you.
You said they were beautiful. I don't remember.
Right now in Africa, there's 3000 beautiful children alive today who should be dead, but they aren't, because of me.
Where are the Adorable flowers that leave you?
I suppose you do deserve some loving after those beautiful flowers you sent me.
I'm saying you might want to go home because there are probably beautiful flowers waiting for you.
